verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is my light <S%H216><s%> and my salvation. <S%H3468><s%> Whom shall I fear? <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is the strength <S%H4581><s%> of my life. <S%H2416><s%> Of whom shall I be afraid? <S%H6342><s%>

When evildoers <S%H7489><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> at me to eat up <S%H398><s%> my flesh, <S%H1320><s%> even my adversaries <S%H6862><s%> and my foes, <S%H341><s%> they stumbled <S%H3782><s%> and fell. <S%H5307><s%>

Though an army <S%H4264><s%> should encamp <S%H2583><s%> against me, <S%H3820><s%> my heart shall not fear. <S%H3372><s%> Though war <S%H4421><s%> should rise <S%H6965><s%> against me, <S%H982><s%> even then I will be confident.

One <S%H259><s%> thing I have asked <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that I will seek <S%H1245><s%> after, <S%H3427><s%> that I may dwell in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life, <S%H2416><s%> to see <S%H2372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s beauty, <S%H5278><s%> and to inquire <S%H1239><s%> in his temple. <S%H1964><s%>

For in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H7451><s%> he will keep me secretly <S%H6845><s%> in his pavilion. <S%H5520><s%> In the covert <S%H5643><s%> of his tabernacle <S%H168><s%> he will hide <S%H5641><s%> me. <S%H7311><s%> He will lift me up on a rock. <S%H6697><s%>

Now my head <S%H7218><s%> will be lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above my enemies <S%H341><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> me. <S%H2076><s%> I will offer sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of joy <S%H8643><s%> in his tent. <S%H168><s%> I will sing, <S%H7891><s%> yes, <S%H2167><s%> I will sing praises to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I cry <S%H7121><s%> with my voice. <S%H6963><s%> Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> also on me, <S%H6030><s%> and answer me.
When you said, <S%H1245><s%> "Seek my face, <S%H6440><s%>" my heart <S%H3820><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H1245><s%> "I will seek your face, <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

Don't <S%H5641><s%> hide your face <S%H6440><s%> from me. <S%H5186><s%> Don't put your servant <S%H5650><s%> away <S%H5186><s%> in anger. <S%H639><s%> You have been my help. <S%H5833><s%> Don't <S%H5203><s%> abandon me, <S%H5800><s%> neither forsake me, <S%H430><s%> God of my salvation. <S%H3468><s%>
When my father <S%H1><s%> and my mother <S%H517><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> then Yahweh will take me up. <S%H622><s%>
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me your way, <S%H1870><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Lead <S%H5148><s%> me in a straight <S%H4334><s%> path, <S%H734><s%> because of my enemies. <S%H8324><s%>

Don't <S%H5414><s%> deliver me over to the desire <S%H5315><s%> of my adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> for false <S%H8267><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> have risen up <S%H6965><s%> against me, <S%H3307><s%> such as breathe out cruelty. <S%H2555><s%>
I am still <S%H3884><s%> confident <S%H539><s%> of this: <S%H7200><s%> I will see the goodness <S%H2898><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
Wait <S%H6960><s%> for Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Be strong, <S%H553><s%> and let your heart <S%H3820><s%> take courage. <S%H2388><s%> Yes, <S%H6960><s%> wait for Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
